testcase.name: devoFazerPesquisasAvancadasComXpath
testcase.failure:
java.lang.AssertionError: 2 expectations failed. Expected: an XML document with XPath count(/users/user) Actual: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <users> <user id="1"> <name>João da Silva</name> <age>30</age> <salary>1234.5678</salary> </user> <user id="2"> <name>Maria Joaquina</name> <age>25</age> <salary>2500</salary> <endereco> <rua>Rua dos bobos</rua> <numero>0</numero> </endereco> </user> <user id="3"> <name>Ana Julia</name> <age>20</age> <filhos> <name>Zezinho</name> <name>Luizinho</name> </filhos> </user> </users>
Response body doesn't match expectation. Expected: is <3> Actual: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <users> <user id="1"> <name>João da Silva</name> <age>30</age> <salary>1234.5678</salary> </user> <user id="2"> <name>Maria Joaquina</name> <age>25</age> <salary>2500</salary> <endereco> <rua>Rua dos bobos</rua> <numero>0</numero> </endereco> </user> <user id="3"> <name>Ana Julia</name> <age>20</age> <filhos> <name>Zezinho</name> <name>Luizinho</name> </filhos> </user> </users>
